#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int sum=0;
        cin>>n;
        for(long int i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(n%i==0)
            {
                sum=sum+i+n/i;
            }
            if(i*i==n)
            {
                sum=sum-i;
            }
        }
        cout<<sum+1<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
